text: Me ghua me korogha maghɨra me mɨsosi. Me atrivim ko nguibar ekiamɨn aven itir gumazamiziba bar me mɨsuegha, nguibar men boroghɨn itibar gumazamiziba sara mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. Me men tarazi ataghizɨ me itir puvatɨ. Egha me Lipna ko Hebronɨn atrivimning gamizir arazimra, me uaghan Debirɨn atrivim gami.
